Name: Hyperlite State 2.0 Wakeboard
Description: Engineered for elite riders, this lightweight carbon fiber wakeboard delivers unmatched speed and precision on the water. Continuous rocker ensures smooth transitions while the deep center fins provide superior stability for pro-level airs and spins.

Name: Ronix Vault Wakeboard
Description: Perfect balance of forgiveness and performance, featuring hybrid 3-stage rocker for explosive pop off wakes. EVA foam footpads with deep heel-toe sidecuts give you confident edge control for intermediate to advanced riders.

Name: LiquidForce Trip Wakeboard
Description: Low-drag design with variable edge profile cuts through chop effortlessly. Asymmetrical shape optimizes turns behind any boat size. Limited stock - ideal for competitive slalom training sessions.

Name: Slingshot Nomad Wakeboard
Description: Premium wakeboard built for all-day sessions with advanced V.R.T.™ technology reducing swing weight by 20%. Center spine tunnel increases airtime while maintaining board control through landings.

Name: DUP 6.0 Wakeboard
Description: Ultra-responsive flex pattern adapts to your riding style instantly. Perfect for wake-to-wake jumps and rail slides. Triple reinforcements prevent delamination from heavy landings.

Name: Hyperlite Remix Wakeboard
Description: Designed for first-time riders with extra-wide profile and mellow rocker line for maximum stability. Soft flex pattern forgives beginner mistakes while building confidence on the water.

Name: Ronix Core Snapback
Description: Breathable mesh panels keep you cool during hot sessions. Adjustable strap with moisture-wicking sweatband. Structured bill maintains shape after countless beach days.

Name: LiquidForce Beanie
Description: Merino wool blend retains warmth even when wet. Stretch-fit design with flat seams prevents chafing. Ideal for early morning glass-off sessions or cool weather riding.

Name: Slingshot Wool Beanie
Description: Thermal-regulating fabric adapts to changing conditions. Antimicrobial treatment prevents odor buildup. Low-profile fit works perfectly under helmets.

Name: Hyperlite Code Gloves
Description: Pre-formed palm grips reduce hand fatigue during long rope holds. Neoprene construction with reinforced knuckles. Quick-dry lining prevents blisters on bare hands.

Name: Ronix Grip Gloves
Description: Double-layered palm protection for aggressive riding. Extended cuff secures over wetsuit sleeves. Flexible finger panels maintain dexterity for handle control.

Name: LiquidForce Impact Gloves
Description: Tacky synthetic palm material provides superior handle grip even when wet. Ventilated backhand mesh promotes airflow. Touchscreen compatible fingertips.

Name: DUP Flex Gloves
Description: Ergonomic shaping follows natural hand position. Gel padding absorbs rope vibration. Reinforced stitching withstands aggressive riding abuse.

Name: Slingshot Rush Boots
Description: Hinged cuff design allows natural ankle flexion without sacrificing support. Dual-density footbed provides impact protection. Baseplate system compatible with all major board bindings.

Name: Hyperlite Red Bindings
Description: Open heel design for easy entry/exit. J-backstrap closure ensures secure fit. Impact-resistant toe cap protects during toe-side edging.

Name: Ronix Purple Bindings
Description: Heat-moldable liners conform to your foot shape perfectly. BOA® dial system for micro-adjustments. Stiff upper construction transfers power instantly to edges.

Name: LiquidForce Flow Boots
Description: Flexible forefoot zone enhances board feel. Removable insoles allow for custom arch support. Side vents promote airflow and quick drying.

Name: DUP Blue Bindings
Description: Asymmetric liner design eliminates pressure points. Quick-lace system for fast entry. Durable rubber outsole grips boat floors securely.
